package.name: motoman_resources

description.p: Shared configuration data, 3D models, launch files materials, etc. for motoman robots.
This package contains shared configuration data, 3D models, launch files materials, etc. that are shared between different Motoman robot packages.
Approach inspired by the fanuc_resources package. See https://github.com/ros-industrial/fanuc.

package.author: Alec Tiefenthal
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
